title: Riot i don't know how to explain to you now...
body: After i log in it is like retrieing to server about 1 min, when you open everything it is like that as well, what the fuk is going on, i can't believe it, EVEN I AM SELECTING CHAMPION! again. it tells me i didnt choose my champion why the fuk it's my problem, when i go in game it is the same ping as before, but your play is like you are in a 500 ping game, every time we want a help you guys just leave it like oh it is not yours problem and blame on our internet... hell no
